r.s: Image_Text - Advanced text maipulations in images
r.d: Image_Text enables you to deal more comfortable with texts inside GD 2 based images. Create text boxes inside your images, rotate them and let the class align your text inside it in horizontal and vertical directions. Image_Text can although determine the best font-size for a given text box.
r.n: This is a bugfixing release, replacing the broken example file.
